function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Centralization of manufacturing and industry in certain countries","Impact":"Risk of increased spread of contagious diseases in centralized areas","Mitigation":"Diversification of manufacturing and industry across multiple regions","Technologies":"Supply chain management and monitoring systems","People":"Workers in centralized manufacturing hubs","Owner":"Government, international organizations, industry leaders"},{"Description":"High-income economies as key hubs for service sector","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of contagious diseases in highly interconnected high-income economies","Mitigation":"Strengthening health surveillance and response systems in high-income economies","Technologies":"Digital health monitoring systems, data analytics for public health","People":"Residents and workers in high-income economies","Owner":"Public health authorities, government, private sector"}]}
